ISSUE.TITLE: Error after changing SEO Friendly Names issue (with inactive seo names)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sure. 1. Add second language to store 2. Add new product 3. Change "Search engine friendly page name" in "Standard" tab 4. On the "1st language" and "2nd language" tabs leave standard page name same as product name. 5. Try to open product, you will get "too many forwards" error in your browser. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/42411/error-after-changing-seo-friendly-names.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #93 Generate customer invoices in customer language ("OrderSettings.GeneratePdfInvoiceInCustomerLanguage")

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1515 Fixed an issue with "Search engine friendly page name" (with inactive seo names)
